title: We're Going To Have a Problem
description:
Tom Shattuck stirred up controversy by announcing that he secured Fred Couples on his podcast. Kirk gets to the bottom of it (00:01:00). This Saudi Golf League is causing quite the ruckus for the PGA (00:13:50). Chris brought the impressions to the main stage and booked a big guest for At A Theater Near Me (00:24:00). Sofia Franklyn doesn't understand what cancel culture is (00:32:00). Chris finally breaks down his abortion stance (00:47:25). Stealing porn, a new game & more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
